name: Purgatory (itch) (GameSalutes)
description:
Battle your way through Purgatory being careful to only shoot in self-defense. Make too many wrong decisions, and you will find yourself in hell!  But no fear, you can work your way up and a final challenge awaits you at Heaven's gates.

A game made as part of the  GameDev.TV Game Jam 2022 in Unreal Engine 5 by tryfinsigabrt

Full source code and content source:

https://gitlab.com/gamejams-public/gamedevtv2022

The current build is alpha quality and content will be updated in the coming days.
